definitions.definition: clothing, when it is being sold in shops

examples.text: The store sells women's and children's apparel.

definitions.definition: clothes, particularly those worn on a formal occasion

examples.text: lords and ladies in fine apparel

wordOrigin: Middle English (as a verb in the sense ‘make ready or fit’; as a noun ‘furnishings, equipment’): from Old French apareillier, based on Latin ad- ‘to’ (expressing change) + par ‘equal’.
